tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The chart shows the number of students in a UK university who completed (on time or late), failed to write, and rewrote their dissertation in 1990, 2000, 2010.

images.altText: Chart showing student dissertation completion status

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Many museums and historical sites are mainly visited by tourists but not local people. Why is it the case? What can be done to attract more local people to visit these places?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
